Children can develop #type1diabetes at any time. The four most common symptoms are:
1. Toilet 
2. Thirsty 
3. Tired 
4. Thinner 
If parents are concerned about a child they should have their blood glucose checked either in the GP surgery or local pharmacy.

Don’t just ignore it. Speak to your GP. https://t.co/KFP9qlxB9w

Do not delay seeking urgent medical care if you experience any one of the signs of stroke.

Know the signs and act F.A.S.T

Face - Has it fallen on one side? 
Arms - Can they raise them? 
Speech - Is it slurred? 
Time - CALL 999
